name: dns-query
description: Node & Browser tested, Non-JSON DNS over HTTPS fetching with minimal dependencies.

scripts.lint: npm run endpoints && standard *.js bin/* && dtslint --localTs node_modules/typescript/lib types
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run endpoints
scripts.test-cov: node test/env c8 -r lcov -r html npm run test-impl
scripts.browser-test: env TEST_ENV=browser node test/env npm run browser-test-impl -s
scripts.browser-test-cov: env TEST_ENV=browser node test/env npm run browser-test-cov-impl -s
scripts.browser-test-cov-impl: browserify -t envify -t coverify --debug test/all.js | tape-run | coverify

author: Martin Heidegger <martin.heidegger@gmail.com>
